other_tests.findings: The proband was heterozygous for a de novo novel missense mutation (L727Q) on the border between transmembrane helix 4 and intracellular loop 2 of the CASR.
During treatment, no further serious hypocalcemic episodes were noted, and there was a significant decline in urinary calcium excretion.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The serum calcium levels stabilized, the frequency of blood draws reduced, and no episodes of symptomatic hypo- or hypercalcemia occurred during treatment.
